title: Looking For Ranked Team!

replies.body: I'll join your little bunch if you want I can top, jg and adc with kalista
Hey mate, I'm b5 aswell I'd love to join a team and start trying to climb out of b5 I mainly main jg and supp but can really play anywhere if need be send us an add if u keen richtofen1313
Im happy to join your team Im Silver 5 and i could play any role feel free to add me.
